scripts.deploy: npm run sync && npm run invalidate-cache && npm run print-website-url
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.sync: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --output text --query 'Stacks[?contains(StackName, `PetTracker`)][].Outputs[?contains(OutputKey, `StaticAssetsBucketName`)].OutputValue')/ --delete
scripts.print-website-url:
echo "Website published at $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --output text --query 'Stacks[?contains(StackName, `PetTracker`)][].Outputs[?contains(OutputKey, `cloudfrontDomainName`)].OutputValue')
"
scripts.invalidate-cache: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --output yaml --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --output text --query 'Stacks[?contains(StackName, `PetTracker`)][].Outputs[?contains(OutputKey, `cloudfrontDistributionId`)].OutputValue') --paths '/index.html' --no-cli-pager
